about_the_game:
Traitors is a social deduction shooter set in a procedurally generated space station, where the environment changes every round.

The Crewmates will try to repair the station's communication equipment and call for evacuation, while the outnumbered Traitors will use special tools to stop that from happening. Whatever your role, work fast, because the oxygen is running low!

Key features:

  • 4-12 players.

  • A percentage of players will be Traitors, trying to kill rest of the Crewmates.

  • Procedurally generated map with 16 unique rooms.

  • The map, objective count and loot scale with player count.

  • Call for evacuation by repairing the station's communications equipment. The items needed for the repairs will be scattered around the station.

  • Proximity chat.

  • Refill your personal oxygen tank at the Oxygen Generator in hangar. When the generator eventually runs out of power, you will have to find or purchase more oxygen, or perish, your call!

  • Hosts can customize the server rules, ranging from role and round specific to procedural generation settings.

Traitors has lots of items you can loot or purchase:

  • Pistols, rifles, shotguns, melee weapons and grenade launchers. Firearms can be found in safes, deeper in the station.

  • Use Terminals to order equipment such as Teleport tablets, GPSs, Flashlights, Keys, Oxygen Medkits and Ammo.

  • Retrieve your orders from the postal service's package machine.

  • Traitors may use credits to purchase special equipment with instant delivery. This includes time bombs, daggers, disguisers, cleaning kits, mines and more!

Does not feature a text chat, requires a microphone to play!

Join our Discord!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains first person player versus player firearm and melee combat with blood. Does not contain gore.

name: Traitors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-8700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 TI
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone required for communication.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-8700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 TI
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone required for communication.

short_description: A social deduction shooter set in a procedurally generated space station. Repair, loot, scheme and shoot your way through each round. Immersive proximity chat makes lying to your friends more fun!
